Articles.Content:
Welcome to the TF2 Thread!

I\'ll start by posting my best weapons:

-The Sidney Sleeper

-The Brass Beast

-The Fists of Steel

-The Degreaser

-Your Eternal Reward

-The Sharp Dresser

-The Dead Ringer

-The Machina

-The Crit-A-Cola

-The Reserve Shooter

-The Kritzkreig

-The Quick-Fix

-The Chargin\' Targe

-The Eyelander

-Lots and lots of Mann.co supply crates that I always get rid of

Yeah, I should really get premium so I can have hats.

Also because I have two Brass Beasts and my friend is willing to trade one of them for a Tomislav if I get premium.

-The Machina

Okay, yeah wow, ragequit.

Sorry, but, the Machina is even worse than the Backburner in terms of ruining the game, it is so utterly overused and noob-friendly it\'s hilarious, i use Bazaar Bargain for the heck of it.

Now, i don\'t want to start a flamewar, but truly, i don\'t play pyro or use the Machina whatsoever because of how ridiculous they are.

-The Machina

Okay, yeah wow, ragequit.

Sorry, but, the Machina is even worse than the Backburner in terms of ruining the game, it is so utterly overused and noob-friendly it\'s hilarious, i use Bazaar Bargain for the heck of it.

Now, i don\'t want to start a flamewar, but truly, i don\'t play pyro or use the Machina whatsoever because of how ridiculous they are.

Meh, I\'d buy the Bazaar Bargain or something if I could.

I use the Sidney Sleeper anyway.

I am a member of TF2 no BS and i play on their servers, it is very straightforward professional games, i recommend them if you want to avoid the bad apples.

Oh, yeah, by the way, i am trading too, i\'m trying to complete sets, so i\'ve been busy with that for some time.

I can\'t stand the servers that have voices that shout things like \'killing spree\' \'multi-kill\' and \'domination\' whenever it hapenns.

There\'s one such server, and it also has homing-missile firing dispensers that do no damage...

I\'ve been wanting to go into the map-making business myself though for some time.

I\'ve heard that it\'s pretty easy, as long as you have no moving parts.

I\'ll have to agree with you, if i want this stuff, i can go play some retro games.
I have Bills. :3D

I have Bills. :3D

Is it vintage? All the cool kids have vintage.

I have over 250 hours clocked 8) :\'(

I\'m okay, but I\'m best as spy. My loadout:

Enforcer (So sue me, it does nothing but benefit with the DR)

Strange Big Earner (I tend to either die or not die, so the health loss isn\'t a problem, especially with the DR)

Strange Dead Ringer (Best watch, hands-down).

If anyone has a S. Enforcer, hit me up.
TF2 was a big part of my years. I have almost every weapon. I used to be obsessed with the game. If I even go on now, all I do is play on Harbl_Hotel.
People still play TF2? I thought they just idled all the time to get hats.

People still play TF2? I thought they just idled all the time to get hats.

Nah. I do like my hat though.... ;P

A lot of servers are still occupied and tons of people play, many good servers out there.
I mainly slowed down on TF2 after it became occupied with so many 10 year olds my ears couldn\'t escape their voices. Also, as soon as trading really caught on, I lost interest in the game.

People still play TF2? I thought they just idled all the time to get hats.

No. I have no hats and I\'m trying to maps maps for it.

No. I have no hats and I\'m trying to maps maps for it.

Did you mean find maps? Because there\'s plenty of info on the wiki.

Did you mean find maps? Because there\'s plenty of info on the wiki.

Oops...

I meant make maps.

I got the Source SDK, and I\'ve managed to create a 3D rectangle

No texture though, but I\'ll work on that when I get home from school.

Sounds like it\'ll be up by the end of the day, abstract art server maybe?

My Engineer is BAWSE.

Genuine Widowmaker

Untradeable Lugermorph

Jag

Bills Hat

Grizzled Veteran Badge
HNNNNNNG MAP NO WORK D:<

HNNNNNNG MAP NO WORK D:<

Dang. I was looking forwards to it.

hmm, are there any non-f2p\'s here?

in case you are asking now, i am not f2p, in fact, i got it a whole year before it went free-to-play
[Hipster]I had it 2 years before it was F2P[/Hipster]

[Hipster]I had it 2 years before it was F2P[/Hipster]

I bought the game when it first came out.

Therefore I have this. http://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Grizzled_veteran

I\'ve been wanting to go into the map-making business myself though for some time.

I hate that too. But I love cporangex3!

I suck at the game.

I have no idea what to do, what each person does, how the spies work, the maps, the anything.

I know to shoot at things. And sometimes I get a kill.

I have never been so bad at an FPS game before in my life.

I was even better at Black Ops than this, and I sucked ungodly hard at that.
